ActionPlanTemplateItemValue.name: ActionPlanTemplateItemValue
ActionPlanTemplateItemValue.description: Represents the value associated with an action plan template item.

Id.description: Action Plan Template Item Value ID

Name.description: The unique identifier for this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user viewed this record.

LastReferencedDate.description: The most recent date on which a user referenced this record.

ActionPlanTemplateItemId.description: The ID of the action plan template item that this value relates to.

ItemEntityFieldName.description: The name of the field on the action plan template item that this value is for. Available fields include: AssessmentTask.AssessmentTaskDefinitionId—Assessment Task Definition ID AssessmentTask.AssignedToId—AssignedTo ID AssessmentTask.Description—Description ValueLiteral.description: The value for this action plan template item.

ValueFormula.description: A formula used to calculate the value for this action plan template item.

IsActive.description: Indicates whether the task created from this template item is active. The default value is false.

ItemEntityType.description: The type of action plan template item.

IsLocked.description: Indicates whether this action plan template item value is locked or not. The default value is false.

MayEdit.description: Indicates whether this action plan template item value can be edited or not. The default value is false.

ActionPlanTemplateItemValue.label: Action Plan Template Item Value
